Lana Marshall

Portfolio About Contact

Hello, there!

I’m Lana Marshall and I’m a graphic designer.

An Austin native, I moved to New York fresh out of high school to attend Pratt Institute. After a comprehensive study of design, illustration and advertising, I earned my B.A. in Communications Design. I then returned to my hometown where I worked as a freelance graphic designer before joining the team at Social Distillery, as their resident Graphic Designer.

If you have questions about any of my work or would like a copy of my most recent resume, feel free to contact me.
